entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
